description:
Thank you for your phone call. This is Zoonet Shimada. You`re calling to place an order? Thank you! You`d like the product that appeared on the previous broadcast? Very well. Please give me a moment to confirm your order. Excuse me. (Hold Music) Thank you for waiting. Would you like to purchase the "Polar Bear with a Shark in its Mouth figurine" introduced on Zoonet TV for 7,980 yen? Okay, thank you.
Source: crunchyroll
